detail_desc: Fitted strappy top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Windbreaker in a nylon weave with a lined, drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and elasticated cuffs. Lined.

Padded jacket with a stand-up collar, zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Lined.
High-cut top in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elasticated hem.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Jersey top with a lace yoke and gathers at the top in a relaxed fit. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with pleats front and back, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top.
Long-sleeved dress in textured jersey made from a cotton blend. Round neckline with a press-stud at one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in softly draping satin with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, short cap sleeves, gathered seam at the top and a gently flared skirt. One dress has an all-over print.

Shirt in premium cotton with woven stripes, a turn-down collar and French front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.
Trainers in imitation leather with appliqués, a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Terry linings and insoles and patterned soles.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and super-skinny legs.

Knee-length dress in cool, patterned viscose jersey. Short sleeves with gathers at the shoulders, an elasticated seam and a tie belt under the bust, and a skirt with a sewn-in wrapover and asymmetric hem with a wide flounce.
Hat in a soft rib knit. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a cotton knit with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and draping at the front.
Fitted, short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and button placket.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and legs with stripes down the sides and a short slit at the hems.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.

V-neck blouse woven in a crinkled cupro blend with a collar, wrapover top with a draped effect, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist, a decorative knot detail at one side, and a lower section with an asymmetric cut at the front of the hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Turtleneck body in crinkled velour with a concealed zip at the back of the neck and long sleeves with an organza flounce on the inside of the shoulders to create a puff effect. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs.

Push-up bra in microfibre and satin with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Scarf in soft wool with fringes on the short sides. Size 66x210 cm.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose and cotton blend with long sleeves and wide ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem.
Shaping briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. The briefs have a firm sculpting effect on the waist.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and ties, a yoke with concealed pleats at the back, and side pockets.
Glittery tulle skirt with a shimmering elastic waistband. Lined.
Trousers in sturdy jersey with a high waist with concealed elastication. Concealed zip in the side and tapered legs with decorative seams and a concealed zip at the hems.
Biker trousers in imitation patent leather with a zip and button, decorative zips at the front and real back pockets. Slim legs with decorative seams at the knees and quilted sections.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress with a fine-knit top and woven, flared, lined skirt.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neckline and buttons at the back of the neck. Long, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a loose fit with low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Cotton chinos with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button, and slim legs.
Metal hair grips in various designs decorated with plastic beads and glass rhinestones.
Shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and side and back pockets.
Cropped vest top in slub jersey.

Cold shoulder playsuit in a crêpe weave with narrow, frill-trimmed elastication at the top and an opening with ties at the front. Narrow, bow-topped shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, and wide, flounce-trimmed legs. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in a patterned crêpe weave with pleats at the shoulders, a concealed zip at the back and seam at the waist. Unlined.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Short raglan sleeves and reflective details.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with decorative zips and seams on the legs. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and a zip fly and button. Extra-slim fit.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides. Partly lined.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Ankle-length trousers in a viscose weave. Covered elastication and a decorative bow with tassels at the waist, diagonal side pockets and leopard-print stripes down the sides.
Short satin dressing gown with a lace yoke and short, wide sleeves with lace trims. Concealed ties and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Running vest top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details at the back.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in soft jersey with a glittery text print on the front, a braided detail at the top and an asymmetric, raw-edge hem.
Tube scarf in soft, ribbed jersey. Length 35 cm, circumference 50 cm.

Dungarees and a top in soft jersey. Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, shoulder straps with adjustable buttoning,and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top with long sleeves and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Metal hoop earrings with fabric tassels at the bottoms. Length approx. 7.5 cm.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with a bow on the shaft.
Metal rings in various designs.
Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Dress in patterned modal crêpe with buttons at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow, and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.

Warm-lined boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Soft velour linings and insoles and chunky soles. Height of soles 3.5 cm.
Leggings in soft, stretch jersey with a glittery elastic waistband.
Sleeveless dress in a plumeti cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Concealed zip in one side, a seam under the bust with pleats and a wide skirt. Lined.

Wide, ankle-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon made from a silk blend. Small stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the top, gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist, a gathered seam at the hips and a wide, voluminous skirt. Detachable, fitted underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide top in closely-woven mesh with a round neckline, print motif on the front, cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Leggings with a print on one leg and a contrasting colour waist panel.

Hi-tops in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Soft faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Height of soles 2 cm.
Long polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck opening at the front.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the sleeves and reflective details.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
T-shirt in patterned cotton piqué with a small embroidered detail at the top. Rounded collar, button placket, puff sleeves and slits at the hem.
